Container.Name: quassel-core
Container.Overview:
Quassel-core(http://quassel-irc.org/) is a modern, cross-platform, distributed IRC client, meaning that one (or multiple) client(s) can attach to and detach from a central core.
This container handles the IRC connection (quasselcore) and requires a desktop client (quasselclient) to be used and configured. It is designed to be always on and will keep your identity present in IRC even when your clients cannot be online. Backlog (history) is downloaded by your client upon reconnection allowing infinite scrollback through time.
Container.Changes:
### 2023-11-10 - Rebase to Alpine 3.18.
### 2023-07-03 - Deprecate armhf. As announced here(https://www.linuxserver.io/blog/a-farewell-to-arm-hf)
### 2023-02-13 - Rebase to Alpine 3.17, migrate to s6v3.
### 2022-01-03 - Rebase to alpine 3.15. Add new build deps and apply other fixes for 0.14.
### 2021-08-07 - Fixing incorrect database password variable operator.
### 2019-12-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.11.
### 2019-06-28 - Rebasing to alpine 3.10.
### 2019-03-23 - Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
### 2019-03-20 - Make stateless operation an option, with input from one of the quassel team.
### 2019-01-26 - Add pipeline logic and multi arch.
### 2019-01-08 - Rebase to Ubuntu Bionic and upgrade to Quassel`0.13.0` See here.(https://quassel-irc.org/node/134).
### 2018-07-30 - Rebase to alpine:3.8 and use buildstage.
### 2018-01-03 - Deprecate cpu_core routine lack of scaling.
### 2017-12-09 - Rebase to alpine:3.7.
### 2017-11-26 - Use cpu core counting routine to speed up build time.
### 2017-07-12 - Add inspect commands to README, move to jenkins build and push.
### 2017-05-27 - Rebase to alpine:3.6.
### 2017-05-13 - Switch to git source.
### 2016-12-28 - Rebase to alpine:3.5.
### 2016-11-23 - Rebase to alpine:edge.
### 2016-09-23 - Use QT5 dependencies (thanks bauerj).
### 2016-09-10 - Add layer badges to README.
### 2016-08-28 - Add badges to README.
### 2016-08-10 - Rebase to xenial.
### 2015-10-14 - Removed the webui, turned out to be to unstable for most usecases.
### 2015-09-01 - Fixed mistake in README.
### 2015-07-30 - Switched to internal baseimage, and fixed a bug with updating the webinterface.
### 2015-07-06 - Enabled BLOWFISH encryption and added a (optional) webinterface, for the times you dont have access to your client.

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: The port quassel-core listens for connections on.
